message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I think it's a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us. How about we settle at $10,500? It's a slight adjustment from my initial offer, but I'm confident it reflects the product's true value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,800, but that's as high as I can go. I hope we can meet in the middle.
